import React from 'react' const products = [ { id: 1, name: 'Basic Tee', href: '#', imageSrc: 'https://media.zid.store/bda63855-f7ff-4be7-bd9f-1d497a22336c/7cad1f3f-ab5a-4c42-888f-71b8127c4133.png', imageAlt: "Front of men's Basic Tee in black.", price: '$35', color: 'Black', }, // More products... ] const Card = () => { return (

Customers also purchased

{products.map((product) => (

{product.name}

{product.color}

{product.price}

))}
) } export default Card
